prompt: Photorealistic image capturing a distinguished, middle-aged antique appraiser with reading glasses perched low, meticulously examining an ornate silver teapot using a magnifying loupe. The scene is set at a polished mahogany desk cluttered with antique reference books, valuation tools, and other small curios. Soft, directional window light illuminates the scene from the left, highlighting textures and details. Shallow depth of field focuses sharply on the appraiser's hands, the loupe, and the teapot, while the background remains softly blurred. Professional, informative, and slightly academic style. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: free-antique-appraisal-image-1.png

prompt: Dramatic close-up, macro photography style, focusing intensely on the intricate details of an antique pocket watch lying open on a piece of dark, textured velvet cloth. Focused, high-contrast lighting emphasizes the delicate internal gears, the aged patina on the engraved gold casing, and the Roman numerals on the enamel dial. The background is completely out of focus, creating a sense of isolation and importance for the object itself. Highly detailed, sharp focus, photorealistic rendering, suitable for showcasing valuable finds. --ar 16:9
name: free-antique-appraisal-image-2.png

prompt: Wide-angle, documentary-style photograph capturing the bustling yet organized atmosphere of a 'Free Antique Appraisal Day' event inside a well-lit gallery or auction house setting. Focus is drawn to a foreground interaction where a diverse group of people wait patiently in a short queue, holding various items (e.g., painting, jewelry box, small sculpture), while an appraiser examines an object at a designated table. Subtle banners indicating 'Free Valuations' are visible. Natural, ambient lighting, capturing a sense of community and accessibility. Photorealistic. --ar 16:9
name: free-antique-appraisal-image-4.png

prompt: A poignant close-up shot focusing on an elderly person's hands gently holding a small, framed, sepia-toned photograph, perhaps of an ancestor. Their facial expression, partially visible at the edge of the frame, shows a mix of nostalgia and quiet satisfaction after receiving a verbal appraisal off-camera. The background is a simple, softly lit, neutral-toned wall, ensuring the focus remains on the person and the heirloom. Warm, soft lighting enhances the emotional connection and the perceived value beyond monetary worth. Intimate, storytelling style, photorealistic. --ar 16:9
name: free-antique-appraisal-image-5.png
